thinking: The first turn should focus on building a barracks as quickly as possible. Since we start with 5 resources and barracks cost 5, the base will now make a worker, the worker will now build a barracks to prepare to make combat units next turn. The target location for the barracks will be near the base.

Following the suggested strategy, I should build a barracks to enable unit production. I have enough resources at my base (5). I will use the worker to build the barracks near the base.

After the worker is idle, I will build the barracks.

Okay, it's turn 200. I need to focus on building a barracks and then producing units. I have 5 resources at my base. My worker is currently busy, and my base is idling. Let's start by having my base produce a worker, and then have the new worker build a barracks.
The current turn is 250. I should focus on building a barracks and training units. I will use the worker to build a barracks and the base to train a worker. I should also harvest resources.
The ally base has enough resources to build a barracks. The worker should build a barracks near the base to start producing military units.

Okay, it's turn 450. I need to focus on building up my army and economy. I already have a barracks. I will train a heavy and then attack enemy workers.

Okay, it's turn 500. I need to focus on expanding my army and economy to close out the game. I already have a barracks, so I should focus on training units and attacking enemy workers to cripple their economy. I will prioritize training heavy units since they have high HP and high damage.

The game is in the late stage. I will focus on attacking the enemy base and enemy workers and continue to train heavy units. I will assign the barracks to train a heavy and have the heavy attack the enemy base. I will also attack the closest worker.
Okay, it's turn 600. I need to focus on economy and building more units. I have a barracks and a base. I will train a heavy unit and have the base harvest resources.

The game is in the mid game. I need to train more units and attack the enemy workers. I will train a heavy and then attack the nearest enemy worker.
